description:
http://anidb.net/ch12159 [Kengo]`s older sister, Mayu, has an obsession: ikemen. Unfortunately for her, she works in an office full of dull old men, so she drowns her sorrows at http://anidb.net/ch12178 [Master]`s Bar STILL after work and pounces on any cute guys who cross her path, including http://anidb.net/ch12157 [Akira].
She once gets possessed by a kokuchi but is saved by Kengo, Akira and Shirogane. Later, Master teaches her how to exorcise evil spirits.
name: Asamura Mayu
